subject: Re: [junit] A DOUBT REGARDING JUNIT
msgSnippet: ... This is an interesting question. I ll try to provide a short answer. JUnit can be a testing tool or a design tool or both. If you re using it to test
messageBody:
swathi swathi wrote:
>
> HEY ANYBODY PLEASE CLEAR MY DOUBT
> I HAVE JOINED IN A COMPANY FOR INTERN AND
> THEY SAID ME TO WORK ON JUNIT
> MY DOUBT IS THAT DOES WORKING ON JUNIT COME UNDER
> TESTING ?

This is an interesting question. I'll try to provide a short answer.

JUnit can be a testing tool or a design tool or both. If you're using it
to test existing code, then it's a test tool. If you're using it to
test-drive new code, then it's usually a design tool first and a test
tool second.

> AND I MA NEW TO IT AND WHERE CAN I GET THE REQUIRED
> INFORMATION SO THAT I CAN UNDERSTAND IT EASILY AND CAN
> WORK ON IT IN A BETTER WAY?

Google is your friend. Try "JUnit guide" to get you started, or buy a
few of the many excellent books on the topic.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
